3: You've been coming home early recently, Morian.
Your brother's doing a great job, finishing his work early. That's why he's home early to spend more time with you, Murray.
A mechanical engineer... and working for a big company! Morian, you're amazing! And you look so cool in this outfit as well! I wonder if I'll get to be like you someday...
...That day will come. You'll be even cooler and more awesome than me, kid.
I'm... fine... Morian... Please don't be mad at me...
But I've been sneaking out... these past few days and... I spent all the money... I've been saving...
Is this the chip... you wanted?
This... can't be it... Oh, Murray, you know damn well...!
I... didn't really know... which chip you... cough...n-needed...
But this one... this one... looked the best...
...Yes, this is the chip I needed, Murray. Exactly the one. Great job.
When I can't be by your side... Then the little robot... can stand in for me... with its new chip... and stay with you, brother...
